short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a 60-second pause before checkout, helping you reflect on your cart total and decide before making a purchase.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We created Think Before You Buy to counter the manipulation tactics used by online platforms that encourage impulse buying. By adding a 60-second pause before checkout, this extension helps you reflect on your cart total and make more thoughtful decisions, putting you back in control of your spending habits.
